net.javacoding.jspider.core.logging.impl
Class BaseLogImpl

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.javacoding.jspider.core.logging.impl.BaseLogImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Log
Direct Known Subclasses:
SystemOutLogImpl
public abstract class BaseLogImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Log

Base implementation of a logger. It contains a template method that allows concrete subclasses to do the real logging work. $Id: BaseLogImpl.java,v 1.2 2003/03/27 17:44:04 vanrogu Exp $

Author:
Günther Van Roey
